short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on the toolbar button to activate the magnifying glass feature on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Unlock enhanced browsing with Magnifying Glass For Reading, a lightweight addon designed to magnify webpages instantly. Here's why it's a must-have:

1. Easy Activation: Click the toolbar button once to activate the magnifying glass.

2. Zoom In Anywhere: Move your mouse to explore a magnified circular section of the page.

3. Convenient Control: Click anywhere on the page or the toolbar button to hide the magnifier.

4. Customize Your Experience: Adjust zoom level and coverage area in the addon's options page.

5. Toggle On and Off: The toolbar button serves as a handy ON|OFF switch, turning red when active and grey when inactive.

Ready to elevate your browsing? Get Magnifying Glass For Reading now! For bug reports and updates, email us on info@webholix.com
